{{Wireless embedded system |brand=BT |model=Home Hub |revision=3.0A |is_manuf=No |manuf=Askey |manuf_model=RTA4525W |manuf_rev=-D31 |availability= |type=wireless router,dsl modem |fcc_id= |pcb_id=RTA4525W-D31 |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Lantiq |cpu1_model=PSB 50810;XWAY ARX168, PSB 50810 EL, V1.2; |cpu1_cspeed= |fla1=32 |fla1_brand=STMicroelectronics |fla1_model=NAND256W3A2BZA6 |ram1=64 |ram1_brand=Hynix |ram1_model=H5DU5162EFR-E3C |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 |expansion_usb_num=1 |serial= |jtag= |wi1_chip1_brand=Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=AR9227;AR9227-BC2A; |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn= |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Lantiq |eth_chip2_model=PEF7071V |eth_chip3_brand=Lantiq |eth_chip3_model=PEF7071V |sw_cpu= |sw_brand=Lantiq |sw_model=PSB 6972;XWAY TANTOS, PSB 6972 V, V1.3; |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_speed=1G |wan_ports=1 |flags=ADSL2+ |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid=BTHub3-XXXX |default_ssid_regex=^BTHub3-[0-9A-F]{4}$ |default_ip= |default_user= |default_pass= |oui= |oui_eth= }} This device appears to be mostly identical to the [[BT Business Hub 3.0]]. :This device may have 64MB RAM. The default SSID appears to be '''BTHub3-XXXX''' where '''XXXX''' :is some combination of hex digits (upper case letters). *[http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/BT_Home_Hub ''BT Home Hub'' on '''Wikipedia'''] *[http://www.techdigest.tv/2011/05/review_bt_home.html ''Home Hub 3A'' Review on '''TechDigest'''] *[http://gadgetcat.wordpress.com/2011/02/19/home-hub-3-disassembly/ ''Home Hub 3A Disassembly'' on '''GadgetCat'''] *[https://openwrt.org/toh/hwdata/bt/bt_homehub3_1 ''BT Home Hub 3A technical data'' on '''OpenWrt'''] :"RTA4525W-D31(RoHS) Rev:4" is silkscreened on the board. '''Note:''' There are two Gigabit Ethernet ports on this device (WAN + LAN4).
This includes the red WAN port and the right most port on the LAN switch. ==Images== File:Home-hub-3.jpg|front File:Home-hub-3-mid.jpg|back __NOTOC__
